name: 阿尔伯特·A·迈克尔逊
bio_short: 美国物理学家，第一位获得诺贝尔科学奖的美国人。他以对光速的精密测量和著名的“迈克尔逊-莫雷实验”（否定了以太的存在）而闻名。
bio_short_en: An American physicist and the first American to win a Nobel Prize in science. He is famous for his precise measurements of the speed of light and the 'Michelson-Morley experiment' which disproved the existence of the aether.
